$MSFT CEO Satya Nadella is effectively calling the end of software applications as the value layer.

In an agentic world, apps become passive databases while AI agents hold the intelligence, make decisions & do the work 

Apps become commodities while agents become the business.
If you put $10K into $ONDS at the April tariff lows, that position would be worth over $175K today.

$PYPL is acquiring Cymbio to accelerate agentic commerce making merchant catalogs discoverable directly inside AI platforms like like $MSFT Copilot, $GOOGL Gemini, Perplexity & ChatGPT.  

The deal embeds AI-driven ordering directly into PayPal‚Äôs Store Sync & fulfillment stack.

$ASTS has scheduled the BlueBird 7 launch for late February aboard Blue Origin‚Äôs New Glenn marking the vehicle‚Äôs first flight & enabling up to eight Block 2 BlueBirds per mission.

With launches planned every one to two months in 2026 AST is targeting 45‚Äì60 satellites deployed by year end.
$RKLB just sent its first Electron mission of the year ‚ÄúThe Cosmos Will See You Now‚Äù to space.

$RKLB said a Neutron Stage 1 tank ruptured during a hydrostatic pressure qualification test after being pushed past design limits with no significant damage to the facilities & the next tank already in production.

The program continues as planned while data is reviewed.

$LMND announced a 50% insurance rate cut for $TSLA drivers when FSD is active citing data that shows materially fewer accidents.

That‚Äôs one of the clearest third-party validations of FSD risk reduction so far.

$AAPL plans to relaunch Siri as its first true AI chatbot Campos in 2H 2026 with an unveiling expected in June and a September release.

Apple is considering running Campos on $GOOGL Cloud using TPUs and Gemini models signaling a shortcut to scale its AI capabilities faster.

The day-to-day spread between semiconductor stocks (performing well) and software stocks (performing poorly) is reaching extreme readings... in the context of week-over-week and month-over-month readings that also are increasingly extreme.

At the time of this writing, we believe it is right for traders and others who are shorter term in nature, to be contrarian here and fade the winning theme (semiconductors) and embrace the losing theme (software).

To be sure, laying on this bet requires nimbleness, dexterity and timing, but our work suggests the timing is right.

For those who are adroit, deft and believe they have the pluck to ‚Äúpull it off‚Äù we recommend getting in motion, now.

The vehicles to use:

Long iShares Expanded Tech-Software ETF (IGV) / Short iShares Semiconductor ETF (SOXX)

And just as this trade requires/will require alacrity and speed to ‚Äútake a quick, smart profit‚Äù if and as one presents itself, this trade also requires alacrity and speed if and as the spread widens further (rather than contracts) and one is stopped out and forced to exit with a loss.

And stops, as all will know, are personal.  Levels of tolerance, pain, and discipline are unique to each firm, each book, each individual.

Trade well (trade this one especially well)...

-Carter

Website: worthcharting.com

Software stocks have underperformed semis since October, but the Chartmaster @carterbworth says it might be a good setup for a pairs trade.
